name: Descent to Kaylon
overview: An Action game by Steve Stiglich published in COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1984/11 (Issue #17). Gliding asteroids and a layer of clouds separate you from your supply base on Planet Kaylon. Is safe passage possible? For the VIC and 64. Cruising over Planet Kaylon in your spaceship, you spot a supply base below. But as soon as you send off a shuttle ship to the base, a cluster of asteroids sails across its path. Darting quickly through the asteroids and clouds, your shuttle narrowly escapes collision before touching down on Kaylon,
